title: All-Clad TK - Introduction
transcripts: I chose All-Clad because that's what I used. I think All-Clad embraces the same values that we do. One of integrity, one of quality, one of evolution. Those are things that that All-Clad represent and that we represent. The collection I think is very exciting. I chose the different sizes, different metal combinations for versatility. I think if you purchased this set you're going have every piece of cookware in your kitchen to be able to produce a wonderful meal a wonderful range of meals. Each piece in All-Clad t.k. has a brushed stainless steel finish. It's not precious and it really allows you to feel connected to the practicality of using this cookware. If you can't pour a sauce from one vessel to another without the flared room. The new handle design allows for greater control and it's really comfortable. There are so many people who live in urban areas where there are Kitchens a relatively small and compact. So they, there's not a lot of space, so we try to make sure that we have addressed those issues and being able to nest the cookware. The universal lids can be used on a variety of sizes of pots and are really my favorite. I think when we come together around the table it's a really significant time and something that should be cherished. So I would really encourage everybody to embrace the idea of cooking at home. I hope All-Clad t.k. inspires the chef in you.
